about_the_game:
Welcome To The Untitled Game - pretty hard and crazy first person game. One mistake and you have lot, all you have to do is to reach an exit. But no matter how easy it may seem, you will lose. Reach till the end and don't die from bunny with minigun, from falling piano or from flying jetpack cow.
You need to play around 1319325+ times in order to complete this game.
If you always wanted to destroy your pc with your bare hands, then Welcome To The Untitled Game !

Welcome To The Untitled Game - is a completely stupid and hard game. We advice to put your hammer, chainsaw and lasergun somewhere distant from your pc, but you probably don't have any laserguns pew-pew-pew .

Welcome To The Untitled Game - is a completely stupid and hard game. We advice to put your hammer, chainsaw and lasergun somewhere distant from your pc, but you probably don't have any laserguns pew-pew-pew .

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12 +, Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / 9800GTX / Radeon HD 3xxx. OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controller / DualShock 4 / Nintendo Switch Pro Controller and other SDL compatible controllers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14, Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850. OpenGL 4.x+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controller / DualShock 4 / Nintendo Switch Pro Controller and other SDL compatible controllers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 - (64/32) bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 / Phenom II X4 955 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5770 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controller / DualShock 4 / Nintendo Switch Pro Controller and other SDL compatible controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600K / AMD FX-8350 2.1 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 | AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controller / DualShock 4 / Nintendo Switch Pro Controller and other SDL compatible controllers
